breathing_exercises.name: Box Breathing
breathing_exercises.description: A calming technique used by Navy SEALs to reduce stress
steps: Breathe IN through your nose for 4 counts
Breathe OUT through your mouth for 4 counts

breathing_exercises.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
breathing_exercises.description: A relaxation technique that promotes calmness and can help with sleep
steps: Breathe IN quietly through your nose for 4 counts
Breathe OUT completely through mouth for 8 counts

breathing_exercises.name: Quick Reset Breath
breathing_exercises.description: A fast stress-relief technique for busy moments
steps: Take a deep breath IN for 3 counts
Sigh OUT loudly, releasing all tension

breathing_exercises.name: Belly Breathing
breathing_exercises.description: Diaphragmatic breathing that activates relaxation response
steps: Place one hand on chest, one on belly
Breathe IN slowly, letting belly rise (chest stays still)
Breathe OUT slowly, letting belly fall
